trans-unit.source: Represents the header of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表標頭的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來處於選取狀態時，繪製控制項的背景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 用來處於選取狀態時，繪製控制項的背景筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.CheckedBackground*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.CheckedBackground*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.CheckedBackground*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來處於選取狀態時，繪製控制項外的框線的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製控制項外的框線處於選取狀態時的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.CheckedBorderBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.CheckedBorderBrush*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.CheckedBorderBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The contextual tab group that the tab for this header is in; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the tab is not in a contextual tab group.
trans-unit.target: 此標頭 索引標籤為; 內容相關索引標籤群組或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果關聯式索引標籤群組中不是 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 用來取得焦點時，繪製控制項的背景筆刷。

trans-unit.target: 用來取得焦點時，繪製控制項外的框線的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.FocusedBorderBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.FocusedBorderBrush*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.FocusedBorderBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this header is for a tab in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否此標頭中的索引標籤<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this header is for a tab in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此標頭中的索引標籤的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.IsContextualTab*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.IsContextualTab*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the tab that this header belongs to is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已選取 [此標頭屬於] 索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tab that this header belongs to is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果選取的索引標籤，此標頭屬於;，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when the mouse is over it.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繪製控制項的背景，當滑鼠經過的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when the mouse is over it.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製控制項的背景，當滑鼠經過筆刷。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.MouseOverBackground*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.MouseOverBackground*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繪製控制項外的框，當滑鼠經過的筆刷。

trans-unit.target: 用來繪製控制項外的框，當滑鼠經過筆刷。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.MouseOverBorderBrush*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.MouseOverBorderBrush*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 當按下 KeyTip 或加速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟動有關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader"></xref>套用新的範本時。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用，每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref>物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 新自動化對等物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A> property to `true` for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> that this header belongs to when this header gets keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A>屬性`true`如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>，此標頭隸屬此標頭取得鍵盤焦點時。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event data.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to move the focus to the first element in the tab when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed on the tab header.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試向下鍵 索引標籤標頭上按下時，將焦點移索引標籤中的第一個元素。

trans-unit.source: If successful, it marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，它會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 當存取 KeyTip 或加速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟動有關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> of a mouse left button down event on this tab header.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>的滑鼠左鍵按下此索引標籤標頭上的事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.
trans-unit.target: 參與由配置系統導向的呈現作業。

trans-unit.source: The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目呈現指示不會直接當這個方法會叫用，並會改為保留給稍後非同步使用的配置和繪製。

trans-unit.source: This override calls the base <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A> method, and then ensures that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> is completely rendered before the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderRight%2A> properties are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 此覆寫呼叫基底<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A>方法，並接著確定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>會完全呈現之前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderLeft%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderRight%2A>計算屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderRight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab.TabHeaderLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: The drawing instructions for a specific element.
trans-unit.target: 特定項目的繪圖的指示。

trans-unit.source: This context is provided to the layout system.
trans-unit.target: 此內容會提供給版面配置系統。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定其父系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 它用來存取在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>類別</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷

trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.Ribbon*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader.Ribbon*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
